title: String reduction
text: EnglishTiếng ViệtGiven a string containing only characters of 'a' and 'b'. You can reduce this string by replacing a substring forming a?a or b?b by ?; ? is 'a' or 'b'.RequestFind a way to minimize the length of given string by reducing it. Output that minimum length.Input- A string.Output- The minimum length found.ExampleInput:baabaOutput:1Limitations- The length of the given string does not exceed 300.
